snippet: The N.C.A.A. is planning to relocate six championships from New Jersey, blaming a new state law there allowing sports betting on collegiate and professional games.
abstract: NCAA plans to relocate six championship games from New Jersey to undetermined locations because of the state's new law allowing sports betting on single games.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is planning to relocate six championships from New Jersey, blaming a new state law there allowing sports betting on collegiate and professional games.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. to Move Championships From New Jersey in Wake of Betting Law
headline.main: New Jersey Sports Betting Law Spurs Move by N.C.A.A.
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Sports Betting Law Spurs Move by N.C.A.A.
